item.title: Where Goes Ether After DAO Drama: Bears Rule But Pivot May Be Near
item.description:
Where Goes Ether After DAO Drama: Bears Rule But Pivot May Be Near

While bitcoin treads water in the mid-$750's following another bullish week, Ether has been getting some less flattering attention. Early Friday morning the cryptocurrency based project known as the DAO ("Decentralized Autonomous Organization") was exploited for about 3.5 million Ethers, equivalent to around $50 million USD via a quirk in the code related to child DAO's.

item.title: Altcoins Price Analysis (Week of June 20th): Ethereum, Litecoin and DASH
item.description:
Altcoins Price Analysis (Week of June 20th): Ethereum, Litecoin and DASH

Different kinds of altcoin trends can be a reason for a flat forming on the USD market. The dollar's trend has reached its minimal long-term targets. The choice of a new long-term direction is underway as a result. Ethereum's upward trend has ended with a powerful drop.

item.title: Insurance Giant Allianz to Tame 'Cat' Swaps With Blockchain
item.description:
Insurance Giant Allianz to Tame 'Cat' Swaps With Blockchain

German-based insurance giant Allianz has announced it has been successfully testing Blockchain technology and smart contracts for the processing of default swaps and bonds. The company is feeling positive about the potential of technology to increase the competition among financial institutions.

item.title: Bitcoin Payroll Comes to Mexico With Bitwage-Bitso Partnership
item.description:
Bitcoin Payroll Comes to Mexico With Bitwage-Bitso Partnership

Bitso has begun offering Bitcoin payroll services to Mexican workers. Thanks to a partnership with payroll service Bitwage, the cryptocurrency exchange now allows workers to be paid in Bitcoin and receive pesos.

item.title: Despite Bitcoin's and Altcoins' Rise, Nation State Is Here To Stay
item.description:
Despite Bitcoin's and Altcoins' Rise, Nation State Is Here To Stay

A nation state is defined by UNESCO as one where the great majority are conscious of a common identity and share the same culture. The socio-cultural parts of a nation state form its backbone. Indeed, it is possibly for one nation to have multiple currencies or for many nations to share one.

item.title: Swiss Parliament Moves to Deregulate Blockchain Startups
item.description:
Swiss Parliament Moves to Deregulate Blockchain Startups

Switzerland takes another large step in the direction of a crypto paradise with the introduction of a motion to redefine client deposits, exempting Bitcoin businesses from the stringent financial regulations banks face. Members of the Swiss parliament moved to lessen regulations on Bitcoin- and blockchain-based startups.

item.title: Bitcoin Foundation Starts Its Comeback By Appointing New Executive Director
item.description:
Bitcoin Foundation Starts Its Comeback By Appointing New Executive Director

The appointment of South Africa's Llew Claasen as the new Executive Director of the Bitcoin Foundation has been announced at the Blockchain Training Conference / DEVCORE in Canada. Claasen is a venture capitalist and Managing Partner at Newtown Partners in Cape Town, and takes over from Bruce Fenton effective July 1.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Surge in June Driven By 4 Key Factors - BitPay Exec
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Surge in June Driven By 4 Key Factors - BitPay Exec

BitPay CCO Sonny Singh talks about the main reasons for the summer heat in the Bitcoin market. The Bitcoin price has been one of the hottest topics in the entire investment world this month, whether within mainstream circles or within the Bitcoin ecosystem.

item.title: Expert: The DAO Was Exploited, Not Hacked, Ethereum Should Do Nothing
item.description:
Expert: The DAO Was Exploited, Not Hacked, Ethereum Should Do Nothing

Since the June 17 attack on The DAO, there have been several opinions as to what should be the best action to be taken by the owners of Ethereum. Covertress Covertress, founder of Krypton, offers Cointelegraph her analysis of the attack and its fallout.

item.title: Discredited Craig Wright Working on Building a Bitcoin Blockchain Empire
item.description:
Discredited Craig Wright Working on Building a Bitcoin Blockchain Empire

The mysterious braggadocio, and ultimately debunked, 'Bitcoin creator' Craig Wright may not be Satoshi Nakamoto, but he is ambitious enough to be a Blockchain technology king. It appears that Wright has been working on building a patent-based Bitcoin Blockchain empire.
